metadata.title: Wednesday, 29th October, 2014
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    when the rehabilitation of the Chocha-Kaleulu Aerodrome in Kaputa District will commence to enable safe landing of small aeroplanes; and
(b)    whether the local community will be considered for employment when the rehabilitation of the facility is completed.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    when the construction of Kanyama High School in Mwinilunga Parliamentary Constituency will be completed and opened to the public;
(b)    what the total sum of the contract is; and
(c)    how much money had been paid to the contractor as of August, 2014.
